data.message:
Dear Facebook Team,

On the 2nd of Aug 2015, I've wrote an opened letter along with some pictures to Mr. Mark Zuckerberg, hoping that he and Facebook team will find some kindness to help us in promoting Myanmar flood relief. 

https://www.facebook.com/myochitmyanmar/media_set?set=a.1142821912401333.1073741881.100000206043143

Today I've seen that you have not only established the donation center for Myanmar Flood Relief, you are even matching it up to a half million USD$.

My letter may or may not have anything to do with your action but there is no exact words to express how incredibly I appreciate what you've just done for our People.

I will never forget this.

I just want to shout out "THANKS" to all of you.

I also want to apologize for responding this late.
So I've created these logos to show our appreciation to Facebook and you will be seeing many of these on profiles of Myanmar nationals in a few days.

(Cover Photo) https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=1148363788513812&l=ee9f16db85

(Profile Picture) https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=1148363791847145&l=c3a367da9b

May god bless you all.

WE LOVE YOU FACEBOOK.

Ivan Oo (AKA) Myo Chit Myanmar 

#SaveMyanmar
#RescueMyanmar
#HelpMyanmar
#SupportMyanmar

replies.message:
Sorry, I've made a mistake and wrote 5 million instead of 500K$.

Apparently, I am not good @ counting.

I appologyze if I've confused some of you.
